p: As for the land use variables, the percentage of arable land and wetlands in a region (“Land-use model”) is positively correlated with the incidence of WNV and highly significant. However, the wetlands variable loses significance in the final model. The percentage of “Continuous” and “Discontinuous urban fabric” variables, which represent metropolitan and built up areas (residential suburbs, villages), are not statistically significant in any of the specifications. Although the partial effect plot for “Continuous urban fabric” reveals that it has a slightly negative relationship with WNV infections and “Discontinuous urban fabric” has a positive association with WNV infections.
